title: Topic 001 Question 103
body: You have a developer laptop with the Cloud SDK installed on Ubuntu. The Cloud SDK was installed from the Google Cloud Ubuntu package repository. You want to test your application locally on your laptop with Cloud Datastore. What should you do?
options: Export Cloud Datastore data using gcloud datastore export.
Create a Cloud Datastore index using gcloud datastore indexes create.
Install the google-cloud-sdk-datastore-emulator component using the apt get install command.
Install the cloud-datastore-emulator component using the gcloud components install command.
